title: Conferences - small improvements for adding new
body_html:
• 1/ When trying to add a conference without its name, conference is not being added, but the view is broken. I guess there should be for example some alert like 'fill in the name' or a view informing that a conference haven't been added with "Back to index" option.
  • 2/ It's possible to add a conference with end date earlier than start date.

  • 3/ When adding a conference it's possible to choose not round 1 or 2, but 16, 21, -11 etc. You get a view like conference has been created /but it's not on the list/. There's no alert about incorrect round chosen. I think there should be only two values to chose from /1 or 2/.
  • 4/ Similar problem in tickets and flights. You can create a conf with -50 tickets and -40 flight and it gets on the list.

These are not crucial improvements, as conferences are being added by Orga Team and so risk of mistake is close to zero. Only suggesting.
